explanation: [0-0] A man in an army green shirt sits backwards on a beige chair, facing away from the camera. In front of him are two monitors playing clips from the Harry Potter movies. A patterned rug lies on the brown floor. In the background is a brown door. The subtitle "The prototype..." appears at the top of the screen.

[0-2] The man holds two brown cylinders in his hands. In the background, there is a brown table, a white window on the gray wall, and a green plant on the right. Afterward, the man puts on a pair of illuminated glasses and uses a yellow cutter to cut cardboard at a workbench, with a pile of objects behind him.

[2-6] Then the man, with his back to the camera, assembles a cardboard box that looks like a simple VR device. The shot switches to the view inside the cardboard box, where the man looks inside through a gap. The subtitle "Vs" appears at the top of the screen. Then the cardboard box falls apart.
